name: Critical Annihilation
description: Critical Annihilation is a Twin-Stick SHMUP (Shoot-em Up) made entirely out of tiny voxels. We take advantage of voxel technology to hype up the explosive gameplay. Everything is destructible to its core.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or higher Processor: Dual core 2GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI  512MB+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad core GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI 1GB+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
